cpl.readme:
\define icn(icon) \end A button (<>) for the Editor toolbar that applies 'note' formatting to the selected text: <<< ''Note:''
This is a note <<< Assigned shortcut: {{$:/config/shortcuts/note}}
cpl.title: $:/plugins/tg/note-button
